title: Who is your K-pop bias? - Quora

response.answer_text: My bias is RM (Kim Namjoon) from BTS. I wasn’t actually a big fan of K-POP. I have two friends who were fans of BTS before I was. They were constantly talking about BTS and listened to their songs 24/7. I remember they listened to “Fire”. I was so annoyed that I told them the song was lame. Now it is one of my favorite songs. One day we were having lunch and my friends started talking about BTS. I didn’t pay attention that much, because I didn’t understand. I only knew Jimin and V, because they are the biases of my friends. Sometimes I heard about Jungkook and the only song I knew was DNA. One of my friends had a bag with the pictures of the members of BTS. Suddenly my other friend said: “I don’t like Rap Monster. He is ugly.” When I heard her saying that, I got angry. I hate it when people order other people with their beauty. That was the first time I heard about Rap Monster, who now is RM. But I felt really close to him. With that anger I came out a bit too loud and said: “You can’t hate somebody just because he is ugly! And that is your opinion. I personally think he is handsome, even if I’ve never seen him before.” My friends we’re in shock because of my sudden behavior. “Calm down, I didn’t mean it like that.” My friend said. Then my other friend said: “I thought you didn’t like them.” I was calmer then before and told them: “I don’t not like them, but just don’t know them.” After school, in the evening I did a search on BTS and RM. I became to know that we have the same intereses. Two days later I came to school with a different feeling. I told my friends who are ARMY that I really liked their music and all the other things. The whole day long I’ve been talking about BTS and the things I knew about RM. At the end of the day my friend told me I was on my way to become an ARMY. Since then I know myself as an ARMY. After the conversation between my friends and me, I love RM for who he is. That’s the reason he is my bias and I believe it is a different and unique way of loving him.
